findings.title: Two of eighteen tests are failing
findings.description: 2 out of 18 tests failed with the same error “Cannot read property 'status' of undefined”
findings.location: Test files in the project repository

findings.title: Conformance to Solidity naming conventions
findings.description: Not following Solidity naming convention for constants (e.g., UPPER_CASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES)

findings.title: Excess require check
findings.description: Useless require statement when using “Safemath.sub” function

findings.title: Implicit visibility declaration
findings.description: State variables without explicit visibility declarations default to internal, which can cause misunderstandings

findings.title: A public function that could be declared external
findings.description: Public functions not called by the contract should be declared external to save gas
findings.location: Contract with public functions never called from within
